participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and compassionate, Jordan loves engaging with others and making a positive impact in their lives.
participant_1.background: in my spare time i do volunteer work. i enjoy being around people. i am a professional wrestler. i volunteer in a homeless shelter.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Energetic and a bit rebellious, Emily is passionate about sports but struggles with academics.
participant_2.background: i ride the bus to school. i hate math class. i am on the soccer team. my brother is older than me.
